content:
Craft an item of type: ender_eye
inventory=[{"type": "music_disc_ward", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "honey_block", "quantity": 36, "index": 18}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "dark_oak_sapling", "quantity": 26, "index": 22}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "clock", "quantity": 51, "index": 27}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 45, "index": 28}, {"type": "bubble_coral", "quantity": 54, "index": 31}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft an ender_eye, I need to craft blaze_powder from the blaze_rod in slot 45, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: ender_eye
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "music_disc_ward", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "honey_block", "quantity": 36, "index": 18}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "dark_oak_sapling", "quantity": 26, "index": 22}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "clock", "quantity": 51, "index": 27}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 45, "index": 28}, {"type": "bubble_coral", "quantity": 54, "index": 31}]
thought: The blaze_rod has been crafted into blaze_powder, which needs to be stored in the inventory before crafting the ender_eye. I will move it to the nearest free slot, 12.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 2

Craft an item of type: ender_eye
inventory=[{"type": "music_disc_ward", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 2, "index": 12}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "honey_block", "quantity": 36, "index": 18}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "dark_oak_sapling", "quantity": 26, "index": 22}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "clock", "quantity": 51, "index": 27}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 45, "index": 28}, {"type": "bubble_coral", "quantity": 54, "index": 31}]
thought: To craft an ender_eye, I need to place 1 ender_pearl and 1 blaze_powder side by side in the crafting grid. Therefore I will first move the blaze_powder from slot 12 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: ender_eye
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "music_disc_ward", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "honey_block", "quantity": 36, "index": 18}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "dark_oak_sapling", "quantity": 26, "index": 22}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "clock", "quantity": 51, "index": 27}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 45, "index": 28}, {"type": "bubble_coral", "quantity": 54, "index": 31}]
thought: Now I need to move the ender_pearl to the right of the blaze_powder. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, so I will move the ender_pearl to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: ender_eye
inventory=[{"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "music_disc_ward", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "honey_block", "quantity": 36, "index": 18}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 42, "index": 21}, {"type": "dark_oak_sapling", "quantity": 26, "index": 22}, {"type": "seagrass", "quantity": 55, "index": 24}, {"type": "clock", "quantity": 51, "index": 27}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 45, "index": 28}, {"type": "bubble_coral", "quantity": 54, "index": 31}]
thought: Now I can craft the ender_eye by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 1
